content: pulling the cast on sts in multiples of 2 to make the scarf center point of the fringe through bring the wider or narrower fringe tails through the loop and tighten steam comb and trim the fringe evenly 2 | cheery holiday scarf ©2024 shaina bilow designs thank you for using this pattern no unauthorized duplication or distribution www shainabilow com @shaina bilow shaina bilow designs
